PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-03822015-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of SHARON ELIZABETH SPARKES of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Iris G. Petten.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of SHARON ELIZABETH SPARKES of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Iris G. Petten.
